title: My google pixel 2 phone's screen became suddenly blank and it switched off while I was using it. I am unable to charge it or start the phone now. The red light is blinking and I suppose the phone is completely discharged. Can you please check this issue? Also, I think my phone is under warranty as I bought it 13 months ago.
content: The phone is completely dead. I have kept it for charging for over 2 hours. Charger works fine as I am able to charge other devices.
